question:
Which of the following activities is / are carried out by the Common Services Centres (CSCs) under Digital India mission?
  1. Providing quality education / skill upgradation in rural areas
  2. Providing Government services in rural areas
  3. Selling Fertilizers, seeds as well as some private brand products in rural areas
Select the correct option from the codes given below:
explanation: This question is framed focusing on the third statement - which is correct. Common Services Centres (CSCs) under Digital India mission are providing Citizen Centric Services. CSCs are delivering many government and non-government services to citizens in rural India across the country. They have also launched many products: like Patanjali, i-Ball, Samsung and signed agreement with many service providers. Common Services Centres (CSCs) are also selling IFFCO fertilizers and seeds through its vast network in the country. In its endeavor to promote rural marketing and create employment, CSC has launched its first Cash and Carry store in Kanth Tehsil of Moradabad district, Uttar Pradesh. Efforts are on to have one cash & carry store in every block. The store currently has products of Godrej, Patanjali, JIVA, Crompton, i-Ball. The store also offers free membership benefits to other CSC VLEs and government employees. [PIB]
